tasks.label: Boot iPhone 16 Plus (UDID)
args: UDID='C3EBA221-1A69-4269-AD05-0C55B7083ADE'; open -a Simulator --args -CurrentDeviceUDID "$UDID" || open -a Simulator || true; xcrun simctl boot "$UDID" 2>/dev/null || true; xcrun simctl bootstatus "$UDID" -b -l; sleep 2;
